variable.name: DATE
variable.description: CARDIAC MRI SCAN DATE, NUMBER OF DAYS SINCE EXAM 1

variable.name: SLICE
variable.description: SLICE NUMBER AT WHICH THE MEASUREMENT WAS TAKEN
variable.comment: Missing data: B: MEASUREMENT TOO BIG (N = 49) M: MISSING (N = 85)

variable.name: SUBCF
variable.description: UMBILICAL LEVEL WHICH IS LANDMARK AND MEASUREMENT WAS TAKEN (CONSTANT)

variable.name: THICK
variable.description: SUBCUTANEOUS FAT THICKNESS (MM), ANTEROPOSTERIOR MEASUREMENT OF SUBCUTANEOUS FAT MEASURED FROM SKIN TO RECTUS ABDOMINIS AT THE LEVEL OF UMBILICUS MEASURED AT THE LEFT SIDE WHERE THE SUBCUTANEOUS FAT LOOKS THICKEST. IF THE EDGE IS NOT CLEAR, THEN MEASURE THE OTHER SIDE.
variable.comment: Missing data: B: MEASUREMENT TOO BIG (N = 51) M: MISSING (N = 89)
